ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Realm Knights
ComicInfo.Summary:
Don't miss the blockbuster series that pairs fairy tales with horror icons, Medieval legends, Greek gods, and superhero action! The Realm Knights have been defeated. With half of their team presumed dead, the surviving members go to desperate measures to stop the mighty Cronus, whose plan to claim Olympus as his own is moments from succeeding. As a Greek god joins the Realm Knights, the real battle begins!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creators | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Pasquale Qualano & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 1 | B | Cover B | Afredo Reyes & Francesca Zambon | 3 | C | Connecting Cover C | Anthony Spay & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | Comikaze | Comikaze Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Anthony Spay & Ula Mos | 2 | Digital | Digital Edition | Pasquale Qualano & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 5 |
